rules_text:
Spaceflight [i](This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.)[/i]
Whenever this Vehicle deals combat damage to a player or a permanent an opponent protects, you may sacrifice this Vehicle. If you do, destroy target creature defending player controls. [i](Players protect permanents that can be attacked. The protector of an attacked permanent is also a defending player.)[/i]
Crew 1
